thread.title: IATA sees profits increasing across all regions in 2015
thread.title_full: IATA sees profits increasing across all regions in 2015

author: flightglobal.com
title: IATA sees profits increasing across all regions in 2015
text: While North American carriers are driving the improved financial fortunes of the airline industry, IATA sees improvements in all other regions this year even if their profit margins remain relatively weak.
